Welcome to the Spy Code Breaker Challenge! Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to crack the code and access the top-secret vault. The code is hidden in a matrix with 4 rows and 4 columns. Each cell contains a number from 0 to 9.
But cracking the code won't be easy. You'll need to use your deductive skills and apply the following rules: add 3 to each even number and subtract 2 from each odd number in the matrix. 
Once you have applied the rules, you'll need to add up all the numbers in the matrix to reveal the code. 
Are you ready to accept the challenge and put your spy skills to the test? Remember, time is ticking and you only have one chance to get it right!

Absolutely, I'm ready to tackle the Spy Code Breaker Challenge! Please provide the 4x4 matrix of numbers, and I'll apply the rules to crack the code and calculate the final sum for you. Let's get to work!
